EmailTemplate.name: 2019BK-06 Rev A AeroNav Navigators EXTERNAL.2019BK-06 Rev A AeroNav Navigators E
EmailTemplate.subject: 2019 BendixKing Sales Bulletin Updates and Discounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | November 2019
Thank you for being a valued customer. Here is this week's sales bulletin:
Price Reductions and New Bundles for AeroNav Navigators BendixKing is pleased to announce a change in price for the AeroNav line of navigators. From now on, when you purchase any AeroNav 8XX or 9XX GPS navigation and communication system, the install kit will cost only $1, with Dealer Bulletin 2019BK-06 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019BK-06 Rev A AeroNav Navigators.pdf]]>.
The complete list of 2019 sales bulletins is available at aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/sales-bulletins <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/sales-bulletins]]>. Dealers must log in to view these bulletins.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
